net.witerat.cafenatedsql.spi

Class SimpleConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.witerat.cafenatedsql.spi.SimpleConnectionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.sql.Wrapper, javax.sql.CommonDataSource, javax.sql.DataSource, CafenatedFactory, ConnectionFactory

    public class SimpleConnectionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionFactory, javax.sql.DataSource
    This connection factory implementation uses BoneJS to establish connections to database repositories.
    Author:
    John Hutcheson <witerat.test@gmail.com>
